name: Battle in the maze
description:
Control:

1P:

Control : Keyboard arrow control

Shot Key M

2P:

Control : WASD movement

Shot G Key

Description:

In 1P mode your opponent is AI

In 2P mode, your opponent is your friend

Weapon boxes are randomly scattered across the map.

Pick up weapons and crush Powerful AI or your partner.

Objective: To beat the enemy
